title: fruitfulfood - KuoZanHui
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, International, Organic, Buffet, Asian, Taiwanese
description: 果然匯, at 台北市忠孝東路四段200號12F(明曜百貨), is a vegetarian buffet restaurant on the 12th floor of MingYue department store. Uses fresh produce and whole grain rice, and labels its dishes. Much of the spread is vegan suitable. Very nice interior, seats 308. Restaurant breaks between lunch and dinner service during the week. On the weekend if offers afternoon tea service.
streetAddress: 200, 12F, Sec. 4, Zhongxiao East Road, Xinyi District
